title: Photograph, View of the altar and reredos in an unidentified church, 1904–13
title_raw: View of the altar and reredos in an unidentified church
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Vertical rectangle: Altar with lace antependium. The reredos of turrets, and relief gablets. Six figures in niches; St. Peter, far left, St. Paul far right. Lower portion of rose window above, with six arched panels below.

Lower left corner gone.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photograph, View of the altar and reredos in an unidentified church, 1904–13. Printed on sensitized paper. 
1961-83-12.
